title: [Caligos Isle, Lower Berm]
description: Smooth grey pebbles mix with the darker black sand on the rise of the berm, making travel a bit treacherous for those not sure of foot.  Mixed in are bits of sea-worn seashells, their iridescence picked out by the moonlight, glittering pale white, cream, and pink, when the fog allows the beams through its mist.

Smooth grey pebbles mix with the darker black sand on the rise of the berm, making travel a bit treacherous for those not sure of foot.  Mixed in are bits of sea-worn seashells, their iridescence glittering pale white, cream, and pink amid the darker hues.
